creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: predominantly purple huipil with embroidered and woven accents of green, white, orange, and pink in the form of geometric shapes; neck and sleeves are decorated with black velvet; neck opening is circular with a vertical center stitch in the front; constructed of two panels
title: Ceremonial huipil
